subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Miami’s LeBron James scored 32 points in just three quarters, and the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony barely broke double digits in scoring as the Heat won the first game of the series.
snippet: Miami’s LeBron James scored 32 points in just three quarters, and the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony barely broke double digits in scoring as the Heat won the first game of the series.
